pos_mean_info_list.mean: 包括（include的过去式和过去分词）

word_mean_info__list.difference: 常和contain换用。指能够容纳或有足够的容纳量。强调包容能力。
普通用词，所涉及的物体常常是其组成部分或内容。强调包容关系。既可指具体有形的东西，也可指抽象无形的东西。
把包含因整体的性质决定的成分或结果。所包括的往往是无形的，不可触知的东西，多用作引申。
正式用词，指把某事物纳入整个之中。
书面用词，暗指一个整体包括不同部分所组成，可与include交换使用。
正工用词，指包含在整体范围以内。
普通用词，指一整体包含着各独立的部分，也指某东西包含另一东西的某一部分。

bilingual.source: Will you need to include a diagram?

bilingual.source: Make sure that you include an introduction and a conclusion.
Also include some reference photos, if possible.

最近新增的词汇包括“自拍”和“网民”。
其他人包括家庭作业、参与和出勤。

bilingual.source: Fruit teas now include mango, strawberry, apple and pear.

list.abstract: include在JSP中包含一个静态的文件，同时解析这个文件中的JSP语句。用于引入其它JSP页面，如果使用include指命引入了其它JSP页面，那么JSP引擎将把这两个JSP翻译成一个servlet。

yingyinNormal.en: Database downloaded. Treatments include: Contact with friends, and loved ones.
yingyinNormal.zh: 数据库下载完成，治疗方法包括，接触朋友，爱人。

yingyinNormal.en: When you say "Making it work," does that include doing the cyber nasty?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你这句“正在努力”包不包括玩些线上耍流氓啊？

yingyinNormal.en: There are actually five. Those include the roar's resonance, the duration of the roar, and the...
yingyinNormal.zh: 其实有5项，包括吼叫的回音、长度…

yingyinNormal.en: Now what are you doing? Other treatments include compassion, and physical reassurance.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你现在在做什么？其他治疗方法包括，关怀和安抚。

yingyinNormal.en: The animals include the horse, goat, tiger, rooster, dog, pig. And, of course, the monkey.
yingyinNormal.zh: 生肖里包括马，羊，虎，鸡，狗，猪。当然还有猴。

yingyinNormal.en: Now let's look at where we are in reality, recent headlines, in the media, include Foreign Policy magazine.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那现在来看看，现实中我们的情况，媒体中最近的标题，包括外交政策杂志。

yingyinNormal.en: Practical applications include surveillance, industrial sabotage, and the elimination of obstructions on the road to peace.
yingyinNormal.zh: 实用范围包括监视，工业破坏，以及铲除通往和平途中的所有障碍。

yingyinNormal.en: For Hoiwe's occupation, should I include that he was astronaut?
yingyinNormal.zh: 填华仔的职业时，我该把宇航员也写进去吗？

yingyinNormal.en: You wanted to include the Governor, I want to include Ahmadi.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你想叫上州长，我想叫上艾哈迈德。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, you could include us in your little brain trust. You can more than include us. You can bow down to our superior intellect.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们可以把我们收入你们的智囊团。不仅要收我们。还要臣服于我们的超群智慧。

yingyinNormal.en: So Smackle and I wanted to include you in our world, too.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们想了解你，所以就给了你这款游戏，这可以帮助我们去了解你。

yingyinNormal.en: So Smackle and I wanted to include you in our world, too.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以史麦科和我想让你成为我们生活中的一部分。

yingyinNormal.en: Ba-ba-ba-ba. Are you sure you want to include him in this?
yingyinNormal.zh: 吡吡吡吡吡，你确定要把他也牵扯进来吗？

yingyinNormal.en: 233 if we include the one somebody forgot to press record on.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果某人有次没忘了按下录制键，那应该是233集。

yingyinNormal.en: Well if you like, we can include your names in our newsletter.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们可以把二位的名字登到新闻通讯里。

yingyinNormal.en: Include me in what? Is there a plot afoot? I'll have no truck with plots.
yingyinNormal.zh: 牵扯进什么东西？有什么正在策划中的阴谋？我可绝对不参与阴谋。

yingyinNormal.en: I mean, if you're going for the truth, doesn't that include being thorough? Being balanced?
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果你真的要查真相，难道不该查得全面一点，公正一点吗？

yingyinNormal.en: These include areas typically associated with social cognition, attention, and cognitive control.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这些区块基本上都和社会认知注意力以及认知控制有关。

yingyinNormal.en: I see. Well, then perhaps you'd have time for a hot beverage? Popular choices include tea, coffee, cocoa.
yingyinNormal.zh: 了解，那有没有时间喝个热饮？最受欢迎的有茶，咖啡，可可。

yingyinNormal.en: Watch a posture and physicality, this include everything from stand and naturally, to breathing from your diaphragm.
yingyinNormal.zh: 注意自己的仪态，从头到脚每个细节都要滴水不漏。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《公开场合演讲如何展现自信？》

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: comprise or contain as part of a whole

examination_example.sentence: Other companies <highlight>including</highlight> Amazon and Disney had also pledged to create their own plans.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 包括亚马逊和迪士尼在内的其他公司也承诺制定自己的计划。

examination_example.sentence: So I decided to look for some fashion-related courses that <highlight>included</highlight> writing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所以我决定找一些包括写作在内的与时尚相关的课程。

examination_example.sentence: A century ago, the immigrants from across the Atlantic <highlight>included</highlight> settlers and sojourners.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一个世纪前，来自大西洋彼岸的移民包括定居者和旅居者。

sense_info_list.en: make part of a whole or set

examination_example.sentence: Asking them questions about what they like about the backyard of a potential home will make them feel like they're being <highlight>included</highlight> in the decision-making process.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 询问他们对潜在家庭后院的喜好会让他们感觉自己被纳入了决策过程。

word_usage.usage: 作动词指“包含；包括”时，通常不用于进行时。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: v. 包括；包含；列入；允许…加入；允许…同享

sense_info_list.en: comprise or contain as part of a whole

examination_example.sentence: Over time, Goddard's rockets grew more sophisticated and <highlight>included</highlight> the installation of instruments.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着时间的推移，戈达德的火箭变得更加复杂，包括安装仪器。

examination_example.sentence: It also <highlight>includes</highlight> the impact of overcrowding, litter and the kinds of behaviour associated with noisy parties.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它还包括过度拥挤的影响，垃圾和与吵闹的聚会相关的各种行为。

examination_example.sentence: This <highlight>includes</highlight> the impact of short-term lets on housing costs and quality of life for residents.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这包括短期出租对居民住房成本和生活质量的影响。

examination_example.sentence: The wireless age is expanding to <highlight>include</highlight> not just our phones, tablets, and laptops, but also our cars, homes, and even whole communities.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 越来越多的“新成员”正在进入无线时代，除了我们的手机、平板和笔记本电脑，连我们的汽车、住宅，甚至整个社区也都加入了无线的队伍。

word_usage.usage:
include为静态动词，表示状态，不能用于进行时态。
示例：这个计划包含了我绝大多数的建议。
误 The plan is including most of my suggestions.
正 The plan includes most of my suggestions.

“包括...”用include sth.，“包括做某事”用include doing sth.表达。include后不接动词不定式作宾语。
示例：你的职责包括接电话。
误 Your duties include to answer the telephone. 
正 Your duties include answering the telephone.

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 正工用词, 指包含在整体范围以内。
普通用词, 所涉及的物体常常是其组成部分或内容。强调包容关系。既可指具体有形的东西, 也可指抽象无形的东西。
正式用词, 指把某事物纳入整个之中。
常和 contain 换用。指能够容纳或有足够的容纳量。强调包容能力。
普通用词, 指一整体包含着各独立的部分, 也指某东西包含另一东西的某一部分。
把包含因整体的性质决定的成分或结果。所包括的往往是无形的, 不可触知的东西, 多用作引申。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 一切服务包含在内的；包含的；不排斥任何一方的；包括的；包括明示界限在内的；不排斥社会任何部分的；有意避免性别歧视的
n. 包括；包含；包体；夹杂物；内容；成员；内含物

word_family.mean: v. 包括；包含；列入；允许…加入；允许…同享

sense_info_list.en: comprise or contain as part of a whole

examination_example.sentence: Other emotions triggered by math <highlight>include</highlight> feelings of tension and frustration.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 数学引发的其他情绪包括紧张和沮丧的感觉。

examination_example.sentence: The projects <highlight>included</highlight> in the study raised S4000 on average, with 30% receiving less than $1000.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这项研究中的项目平均筹集了4000美元，其中30%的项目不到1000美元。

examination_example.sentence: Later, in his cook books, he would often <highlight>include</highlight> a sketch of himself, so that people on the street would be able to recognize-and admire-him.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 后来，在他的烹饪书籍中，他经常会加上自己的素描，以便街上的人们能够认出并欣赏他。

sense_info_list.en: make part of a whole or set

examination_example.sentence: Most people did not <highlight>include</highlight> snacks when reporting their calorie intake.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大多数人在报告热量摄入时没有包括零食。

examination_example.sentence: Now more and more high schools in America are <highlight>including</highlight> ethnic studies in their curriculums.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在美国越来越多的高中将民族研究纳入课程。

examination_example.sentence: Since employers' perception of weight is what matters in the labor market, changing discrimination laws to <highlight>include</highlight> body type as a category would help.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 由于雇主对体重的看法在劳动力市场上很重要，因此改变歧视法，将体型算作一个类别将有所帮助。

word_usage.usage:
“包括...”用include sth.，“包括做某事”用include doing sth.表达。include后不接动词不定式作宾语。
示例：你的职责包括接电话。
误 Your duties include to answer the telephone. 
正 Your duties include answering the telephone.

include为静态动词，表示状态，不能用于进行时态。
示例：这个计划包含了我绝大多数的建议。
误 The plan is including most of my suggestions.
正 The plan includes most of my suggestions.

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 正工用词，指包含在整体范围以内。
普通用词，所涉及的物体常常是其组成部分或内容。强调包容关系。既可指具体有形的东西，也可指抽象无形的东西。
正式用词，指把某事物纳入整个之中。
常和 contain 换用。指能够容纳或有足够的容纳量。强调包容能力。
普通用词，指一整体包含着各独立的部分，也指某东西包含另一东西的某一部分。
把包含因整体的性质决定的成分或结果。所包括的往往是无形的，不可触知的东西，多用作引申。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Guided tour <highlight>includes</highlight> bike, helmet, cookies and bottled water.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有导游的游览包括自行车，头盔，饼干和瓶装水。

examination_example.sentence: Visit the palace and its various historic gardens, which <highlight>include</highlight> the famous maze (迷宫) where it is easy to get lost!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 参观宫殿及其各种历史园林，其中包括著名的迷宫，在里面很容易迷路！

examination_example.sentence: Stratford: <highlight>Includes</highlight> a guided tour exploring much of the Shakespeare wonder.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 莎翁小镇：包括一段由导游带领的探索诸多莎士比亚奇迹的旅程。

word_usage.usage:
including为介词，意为“包括…在内”。 
including + 被包括部分=被包括部分 + included
Sixty people lost their lives in the fire accident, including ten old people and six children.
=Sixty people lost their lives in the fire accident, ten old people and six children included.
在这次火灾事故中有60人丧生，包括 10个老人和6个孩子。

examination_example.sentence: They travelled across China and more than 20 countries over the world, <highlight>including</highlight> Italy, Thailand and Singapore.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们走遍了中国和世界上20多个国家，包括意大利、泰国和新加坡。

examination_example.sentence: A good study plan <highlight>includes</highlight> a study calendar and a to-do list.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一个好的学习计划包括学习日历和待办事项清单。

examination_example.sentence: There are many things to enjoy about traveling, <highlight>including</highlight> the natural beauty and delicious food．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 旅行有很多值得享受的地方，包括自然美景和美味的食物。

sense_info_list.en: make part of a whole or set
sense_info_list.zh: 列入; 使成为一部分; 允许同享

examination_example.sentence: All of a sudden I was a part of that, and it felt good to be so <highlight>included</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 突然之间，我成为了其中的一部分，被如此接纳包容的感觉很好。

examination_example.sentence: Please <highlight>include</highlight> your age and hometown.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 请写上你的年龄和家乡。

examination_example.sentence: As one of the most exciting sports, volleyball was <highlight>included</highlight> in the Olympic Games in 1964.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 排球作为最激动人心的运动之一，于1964年被列入奥运会比赛项目。

word_usage.usage:
include为静态动词，表示状态，不能用于进行时态。
示例：这个计划包含了我绝大多数的建议。
误 The plan is including most of my suggestions.
正 The plan includes most of my suggestions.

“包括...”用include sth.，“包括做某事”用include doing sth.表达。include后不接动词不定式作宾语。
示例：你的职责包括接电话。
误 Your duties include to answer the telephone. 
正 Your duties include answering the telephone.

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 普通用词，指一整体包含着各独立的部分，也指某东西包含另一东西的某一部分。
常和contain换用，指能够容纳或有足够的容纳量，强调包容能力。
